title: Digital Multimodal Composition (DMC)-Based Mathematical Problem-Solving Strategy Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and experience in using digital tools
context.additional_context: A course cultivating professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields to solve practical mathematical problems through multimodal configurations

learning_goals: Learners can structure mathematical problem-solving processes in visual and text modes using generative AI and digital tools
Learners can propose multimodal solutions by systematically analyzing complex mathematical problems step-by-step according to scaffolding strategies
Learners participate in formative assessment processes to iteratively improve their DMC deliverables based on peer feedback

resources: AI-Powered Multimodal Authoring Tools (Canva, ChatGPT, etc.)
Case Study Dataset (Medical/Legal/Technical Domain Math Problems)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
